cards.alt: Go Anywhere In This 1991 Chevrolet C3500 With Camper
Go Anywhere In This 1991 Chevrolet C3500 With Camper
Go Anywhere In This 1990 Chevrolet C3500 With Camper

sections: Classic truck and camper make for an adventurous duo.

truck will be ready for anything with the ability to seat six, sleep four and haul just about anything you need it to. And when you're not camping, this big Chevy will let you live out your inner Martin Riggs from
(the movie, not the TV show) driving around in a crew-cab dually and living out of a camper!

For starters, no you didn't read that wrong, this is a legit 1990 C3500 as GM carried over the square body crew cab trucks until 1991. Considering these trucks were designed to be workhorses, this truck is still in great shape compared to how many of these trucks you see completely rusted out or worn down. Sure, there's the patina on the hood and some minor wear and tear inside the truck, but overall, it looks to be a great rig. It has power windows, power locks and cruise control, and the 454 CID V-8, automatic transmission and dual fuel tanks mean this thing can long haul just about anything you hook to it.

As they say, "but wait, there's more." Included with the truck is a drop-in camper that sleeps four. This time capsule of a camper has had very little use in its day as shown by the overall condition and the fact that the cushions and utensils are still in their respective bags. In addition to conveniences such as the four-burner stove and oven, sink, refrigerator, air conditioning unit and a full bathroom with a shower, this camper also has an on-board water heater. What more could you ask for?
If you're ready to hit the open road in a classic truck and camper duo, then give
a call today. They're only asking $9,800 for this adventurous combo, but you can also make an offer
